Title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)

Description: 【 UNIQUE CIRCLES LOOK ADDS A LOT TO YOUR HOME 】these mirrors wall decor have circle on circles design . it’s a novelty home décor with modern and artistic looking. You will create a touch of luxury to your room with these pieces of wall art.

【 SET OF 2 IN DECENT PACKAGE 】package come with 2 pieces cute mirrors in it, which are prepared for free styling and combination with other wall art pieces. Just arrange and match as you like with these cost-effective mirror arts.

【 15.7 INCH PERFECT SIZE 】 each mirror has 15.7 inch diameter with frame. Mirror along measures 10 inch. The size is just perfect to decorate the bedroom /living room or entryway as a boho decoration or hang them on in bathroom as functional dressing mirrors.

【 IRON FRAME - STURDY AND EASY TO HANG 】 Hanging these round mirrors with just one screw put into the wall. The mirror weight is 2lb, which is light to install. High quality annealed glass prevents warping and distortion, give you a real HD imaging.

【 JUST THE RIGHT SHADE OF GOLD 】 The gold framing of these art pieces is something between matte and a bright gold, not too bright and not dull , just perfect to pop a dark wall. Crystal clear mirror adds a shade of reflection to the space nicely.

【 COLOR AND STYLE MATCHES EVERYTHING 】 These mirrors are the perfect addition to the picture wall or above the TV, or to the entryway and office space. They can style a wall independently or combined with other pieces of wall art like paintings/wall sculpture/candle sconces. It will look great anywhere you can try.
